title: Awesome
review: Of all the action movies ive seen throughout the years, i must apologize to Mr, Washington for waiting five years to see this one. Don't uou wait and check out this out.

title: If you tell me the book was better, than the movie ...
review: This movie is billed as a drama, horror, and sci-fi. And it doesn't do it's job with any of them in trying and missing. I guess that near any hospital is a residential area where Malcovich has a shot gun and a two-way radio. Only because he was divorced twice and who knows what might happen this third time around. But we don't get to see that because his third wife is too good to remain alive. Instead we have a group of annoying characters.
